## jsdomPolyfill variable

Polyfill DOMElement.innerText because JSDOM lacks support for it. See [https://github.com/tmpvar/jsdom/issues/1245](https://github.com/tmpvar/jsdom/issues/1245)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
jsdomPolyfill: () => void
```
